joking: I like working for someone with a sense of humour. It makes things much more fun.

tired: Why not catch a little shuteye? I'll be here to chat when you wake up.

sleepy: Why not catch a little shuteye? I'll be here to chat when you wake up.

sad: I'm sorry to hear that. What's troubling you?

testing_agent: I hope to pass your tests. But feel free to test me often. That's the best way to help improve my performance.

busy: I won't distract you then. If I can be of any assistance, you know where to find me.

waits: Thanks for being so patient. Sometimes these things take a little time.

has_birthday: Happy Birthday. And I really mean it. All the best!

wants_to_talk: Talking is what I do best.

bored: If you have a piano, play it… with mittens on.

excited: I bet you are. That's very exciting.

happy: Well, your good mood is certainly contagious.

lonely: I'm sorry. I'm always available if you need someone to talk to.

here: Welcome back. What can I do for you?

wants_to_see_agent_again: I certainly hope so. I'm always right here whenever you need me.

will_be_back: Okay. You know where to find me.

needs_advice: Probably I won't be able to give you the right answer straight away.

can_not_sleep: Reading is a good way to unwind. But don't read something too emotional.

does_not_want_to_talk: Sure thing. I'll be here if you change your mind.

looks_like: You look fantastic as always. Obviously.

good: Excellent. I'm here to help keep it that way.

angry: Take a deep breath. What can I do to make things better?
